body_html: It would have been better to change the autogen to add the comment only to the generated files, not the templates themselves. Otherwise nuclide locks the template file when you want to edit it (and you have to unlock it):
body_text: It would have been better to change the autogen to add the comment only to the generated files, not the templates themselves. Otherwise nuclide locks the template file when you want to edit it (and you have to unlock it):
body:
It would have been better to change the autogen to add the comment only to the generated files, not the templates themselves. Otherwise nuclide locks the template file when you want to edit it (and you have to unlock it):

![screen shot 2018-05-24 at 16 24 38](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6429851/40518378-2ef31bfa-5f6f-11e8-9065-90cf1b8dbfbd.png)
